Name: The Coreward Periphery
Details: The Periphery is a region of space bordering and surrounding the Inner Sphere. The area closest to the galactic core is sometimes referred to as the Coreward Periphery. This is home to minor states such as the Oberon Confederation and their protectorate the Elysian Fields along with several pirate conclaves, including the infamous Butte Hold and the Valkyrate, along with a few independent worlds.
